name: Ultimate Doom Builder
description: Installs the git build from DRD Team.
notes:
This may take a while; the dotnet461 installer is buggy and stalls a lot.

If you are having video issues, try setting the environmental variable `__GL_MaxFramesAllowed` to 0 instead of 1. (Configure->System options->Show Advanced->Environment variables)
content:
files:
- gzdoom_installer: https://devbuilds.drdteam.org/gzdbbf/GZDoom_Builder_Bugfix-r3097.7z
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/gzdoom_builder/Builder.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/gzdoom_builder
    src: gzdoom_installer
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Core Fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing Direct X 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing Direct3D compiler 4.3
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: dotnet461
    description: Installing .NET framework 4.6.1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: winxp
    description: Setting WINE version to WinXP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- write_file:
    content: textlabelfontname = "Arial";
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/gzdoom_builder/GZBuilder.default.cfg
    mode: a
system:
  env:
    __GL_MaxFramesAllowed: 1
wine:
  dxvk: false
  esync: false
  overrides:
    d3dcompiler_43: native
